entry.def: If an organization or system is given a shakedown, it is thoroughly reorganized in order to make it more efficient.

entry.tran: (船只、飞机、汽车的)试用，试航，试飞
entry.def: A shakedown of a boat, plane, or car is its final test before it starts to be used.

means.word_mean: 1. initial adjustments to improve the functioning or the efficiency and to bring to a more satisfactory state;
2. a very thorough search of a person or a place;

sentences.sentence: "a shakedown by the police uncovered the drugs"

means.word_mean: 1. intended to test a new system under operating conditions and to familiarize the operators with the system;
